name: logevent_softwareVersions

fields.name: salIndex
fields.description: SAL index (only present for indexed SAL components)

fields.name: private_efdStamp
fields.description: UTC time for EFD timestamp. An integer (the number of leap seconds) different from private_sndStamp.

fields.name: private_kafkaStamp
fields.description: TAI time at which the Kafka message was created.

fields.name: private_identity
fields.description: Identity of publisher: SAL component name for a CSC or user@host for a user

fields.name: salVersion
fields.description: This is the current version of SAL generation.

fields.name: xmlVersion
fields.description: This is the current version of CSC XML.

fields.name: openSpliceVersion
fields.description: This is the current version of OpenSplice.

fields.name: cscVersion
fields.description: The software version of this CSC.

fields.name: subsystemVersions
fields.description: A comma delimited list of key=value pairs relating subsystem name (key) to its version number (value). This may be left blank if there are no subsystems within this CSC.

description: Current versions of software in use by CSC.
